title: Role that’s fun to play against

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Host a party
-Select a party game and one target
-Make someone do a dare
-Make someone tell a truth

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Hosting a party will make all visits against you fail. People visiting you will be notified that they joined a party instead
-You and your selected target will play a party game of your choice. Whoever wins will have their defense upgraded by one tier permanently. Your target will not be able to do their normal night ability that night
-Dare someone to do something. They must do the dare by the end of the next night or they are modkilled. This dare must be possible by everyone
-Make someone tell a truth of your choice the next day. They must say it in the public day chat otherwise they are modkilled
-JD specifically cannot Rule 17 this role. They could theoretically break this rule, but it would count as a host error

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have one person that you targeted say they had fun during the day
